topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545c094663687263a4fe0100#post_545c094663687263a4fe0100
I get the feeling, but trust me when I say you can't expect too much too soon.  

Here's an exercise- pick your favorite artist, go to their Deviantart page (or equivalent site), and see how long they've been a member. Any decent one is going to have a few years under their belt, and the best artists (in this fandom at least) have been there for the better part of a decade. And I can guarantee they've most likely been drawing for much longer than that. Believe me- it takes time.
